name: Button with Variants + Props
description:
A button component built using atomic design methodologies, autolayout, variants, (newly-announced) component properties and interactive components.


I've completely redesigned this file from the ground up since my previous version! I've found the content layout to be much more user friendly!


Variant Properties:

  • Size
  • Type (Primary, Secondary, Destructive, Minimal)
  • State (Default, Hover, Pressed, Focused, Disabled)


Component Properties

  • Button Text - (Content)
  • Icon (Left) Visibility - (Boolean)
  • Icon (Left) - (Instance Swap)
  • Icon (Right) Visibility - (Boolean)
  • Icon (Right) - (Instance Swap)


If you have any suggestions or comments on this file, hit me up on twitter!
